overview:
Mr. Vullo has 17 years of experience in the technology and telecommunications industries.

Prior to joining DSC, he founded LV2 Consulting, where he worked with more than 40 clients to increase sales and revenue, and successfully sold the company in 2010.

Mr. Vullo honed his sales management expertise working with companies including: Internap Network Services; Qwest Communications, MCI Communications (formerly WorldCom)/Verizon, North American Telecommunications Corporation (NATELCO), RSLCOM USA, and International Telecommunications Corporation (ITC).
